explains: n. 缺乏经验；无经验；不熟练

sentences.en: Critics attacked the youth and inexperience of his staff.
sentences.cn: 评论家们抨击他的员工年轻且缺乏经验。

sentences.en: She realized that her youth and inexperience were being exploited.
sentences.cn: 她意识到自己的年轻和缺乏经验正受人利用。

sentences.en: One should not plead inexperience in excuse of his mistake.
sentences.cn: 一个人不应该借口缺乏经验来为其错误辩解。
